website_summaries.verdict: A smart guitar designed to be a bit smaller so kids, teens, and females can handle it well.
pros: Comes with a few extras like bag, strap, extra strings, and pick
Wonderful for young kids who are just starting out and want to learn how to play a guitar
cons: Some might be surprised at how small it is
Included guitar case is not so great

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay tuned
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar, WILL NOT STAY TUNED. And I’m not talking about after a week or two of playing; I can tune a string and literally a minute later it’s out. Luckily my son is too young to really be upset about it. I will try taking it to a shop to see if they can help. I play and have my own guitar and I’m familiar with tuning. Luckily, this guitar comes with extra strings, so maybe it just needs restrung. If that doesn’t work, I will likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner youth guitar
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner guitar beautiful blue color. Purchased for my 8 year old who is learning to play. He hasn't put it down since it arrived. Definitely like that it came with extra guitar strings. Already broke one string tuning but easy fix with string in hand. Also comes with, tuner, pick, strap and bag! So cool!
customer_reviews.author: CozyClemens

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 year old granddaughter and, even though it is a bit large for her, she loves it and is doing her best to learn how to play. It seems to be a very reasonable starting point for a young beginner. Only time will tell how she takes to it, but it's a darn good value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: First I had problems receiving the right guitar. Then I received the right guitar and it has scratches on it. Then I started to tune the guitar and was not able to do so giving me the feeling I was doing it wrong so I tried the pitch reader, I tried downloading the app, then I took it to guitar center and they told me I wasted my money. I've been trying to tune this guitar for weeks and it's poorly made plus it's a terrible guitar even for a beginning child.this guitar is paper thin and looks like it was put together with glue and I do not appreciate being taken advantage of!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8year old son for his music for homeschool this year. It's a beautiful blue and he can't wait to begin lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Nekimo

customer_reviews.title: Not to sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice starter guitar but while tuning it started to crack and pop and the guitar cracked, Amazon was good enough to refund.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mellor

customer_reviews.title: A great starter for if you just want to see if they'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a child that I didn't think would take up guitar for more than a week or so, but really wanted to try. The quality was better than expected for the price range, and it even came with accessories! The gift was a huge hit! Even though I was right about the duration of the interest, it was inexpensive enough that I didn't mind so much, and it should last long enough that if he wants to try again it will still be there.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Heimlich

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old son. He loves it. We did have to tune it because the string were super loose and also there is only one spot to hook the strap he’s not able to use the strap so that sucks. Would have given 5 stars if it wasn’t for the strap issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil starter guitar
customer_reviews.text: Nice little starter guitar i bought for my 6 years old little boy. i have a 69 FG150 and he wants to play with it an this is going to be his so he can leave mine alone lol..
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's awesome! It's the perfect for my beginner children ages 10 and 14. The case isn't the greatest but it's ok until you find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's like a adult size guitar but it has a strap so the children can hold it. Very durable! I have an Autistic son so he's very rough with things and this guitar survived a lot. Only thing I might have concerns it the turning knobs. They are durable as well and not easily breakable, but as you turn to tune you have to make sure you turn slowly. They're gears versus the usual knobs I suppose 😅, but for children it's keeps them from breaking the strings so 5 stars from me... Absolutely love it!!!!!!! Blue guitar is very vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Marrisa A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had some problem with the guitar and the seller provided an excellent service! The guitar was nicely packed in a secured box. It came with everything and the tuning device was very handy to teach my son how the note and how to tune. The strap is very handy as well. I thought this is great for beginner learner. However, it is big for children at age 7. I truly appreciated the attentiveness from customer service! Thank you for making the whole purchase very pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: T,Ka.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good starter package for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good starter package for the price. The 4 stars here reflects that. I'm not sure how long this guitar will last, or stay in tune for that matter. I had it for a few days before I gifted it to my nephew and it stayed in tune the whole time. It has a very interesting tone that almost convinced me to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sison

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect First Guitar!
customer_reviews.text: It might be 40 years since my last guitar lesson, and I decided to give it a go again. I was beyond pleasantly surprised by this beautiful guitar. I remembered how to tune it, and I even remembered a few of the key chords learned so long ago, and within an hour I was strumming away! I am bound and determined to take advantage of everything offered online, and hope to be a "pro" in no time, with practice!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m an adult, teaching myself how to play, and so far, this guitar is great. I tune it about every other day since I’m still breaking in the strings. The sound is great. I’m more than happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pandamando

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his 5th birthday. He loves it. It’s been going on 2 months and so far it’s held up to the 2 yr old, 5 yr old, and 12 yr old. And they have really beat on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I originally order this product it got lost in the mail but the customer service people were very nice and worked very fast. They sent me a replacement and new tracking number. The guitar itself was beautiful when I opened it up. Really nice blue coloring with little details. It’s definitely too big for a kid but it’s still a nice starter instrument. It’s came a comically big pick that is awesome for beginners ( it’s far too big to lose and comfortable for learning to hold and use properly). Came with extra strings, bag, pitch pipe and a strap.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value. I like the sound quality. It’s pretty big for a kid so I don’t know if there is anything that really makes it a beginner guitar in particular
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not BUY Super cheap. Never in tune and string broke while tuning. CHEAP CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Do not BUY Super cheap. Never in tune and string broke while tuning. CHEAP CHEAP My son almost cut his finger on the thin strings. terrible. CHEAP DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Fairway

customer_reviews.title: A Great Kids Beginner Guitar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this guitar for our 8 year old daughter. It has been a great beginner instrument for her and we have had no issues with sound quality or the strings. I would recommend if you are not musical using a tuning app for the guitar rather than the pitch pipe.
customer_reviews.author: The Shorters

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Nice guitar for the price. The reason for 4 stars is that the strings were not placed correctly when assembled. Two of them are crossed and in the wrong spots. My daughter can't use it until her guitar teacher can fix the issue. The case is not padded at all, and opens only from the bottom so that it has to slide on from the top down. Overall a great buy, but updates and a bit of fixing will be required.
customer_reviews.author: AliM

customer_reviews.title: Resin/Plastic Fret....but still good value!
customer_reviews.text: Mama the musician and she feels at home with this guitar! She's old school she only didn't appreciate the resin fret. She had an old bone/ivory one back in the 70's. Not politically correct but back then music was your voice!🇺🇸 (sorry not a hippie but a Christian young lady!) Class not Sass! But she's sassy now with her guitar! Sing unto the Lord & 🇺🇸!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bell

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made like very cheap lol. Worked good until the tightness of the strings pulled the neck off the body. Split guitar in 2 pieces. Any guitar that breaks from the pressure of normal tunes strings is crap and shouldn’t exist in my opinion. Save your money and buy a beginners guitar from Walmart which yes is cheap but way better fir kids.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Witham Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for a young beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old who loves music. My brother, a professional musician, was pretty impressed with it. He said it's not high quality, but it's perfect for what we bought it for - a beginner guitar that won't matter if it gets all banged up, and it's a real guitar, so good enough to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute guitar but a couple of problems right off
customer_reviews.text: The guitar seems like a nice one but there were a couple of problems with it right off of the bat. One of the strings broke as soon as it was opened. Pretty easy fix. The guitar is missing one of the attachments to attach the guitar strap on! There's no way to use the strap! The guitar can be dropped and broken easily! I looked into an exchange and they don't offer it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars ✨ for necessary strap pin. Otherwise, good.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this starter guitar 5 stars if a strap pin was included at the other end. Other than that, we are happy with our purchase. It looks great, the quality is decent and had no issues tightening the strings. The case is decent quality as well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KLR

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This guitar was a present from Santa and my child loves it. It seems to be the perfect size for her. It comes with a super cute (but cheap) little carrying case and a few other accessories. She loves to sing/play along to videos. The price was great for what we received. Great job Santa!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A couple of frets are not perfect so there is definate buzzing. And you should put nylon strings on this guitar and take off the steel strings. When tightened(steel strings) its too many pounds for the bridge and neck so be careful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar... missing part of it
customer_reviews.text: This guitar & ba are great. Too bad the strap is unuseable..... has somewhere to hook it on the bottom of the guitar.... it has nowhere to hook it anywhere else. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky R

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old son just started guitar lessons two weeks ago so this is his first guitar. The guitar arrive timely and in good condition. It was easy to tune and has a decent sound considering it is a beginner guitar. This is everything that we wanted and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelovelove

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great acoustic guitar for a young child. We got this for my six year old and it's been a great introduction. It's sturdy enough that I don't have to worry about it breaking with a minor accident. I wouldn't suggest it for a performer, but it's a great way for a kid to learn the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: We thought this thing was going to be amazing but the strings in it are horrible and the bottom came cracked. It was a Christmas gift so we didn't notice until we have it to our daughter. Since it was a Christmas gift we can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my son's birthday. After 2 weeks my son asked for a new guitar. He said after he researched it. He found out this was not a guitar for beginners. I didn't know that heck I dont know anything about a guitar except they sound nice.
customer_reviews.author: MsYvonne

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Priceless he's definitely interested and playing with it everyday... I believe it's a good start at the right price just to make sure they're going to stick with it very pleased with this purchased very happy young man 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Williaml

customer_reviews.title: Not a Hardlined Carry Case
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for a beginner I believe. However, the carry case is merely like that of a jacket or suitcase liner. It isn't as portrayed in the picture- rigid enough to stay shapely as if it were hard-backed. It simply isn't what the picture made it to look like. That is really my only complaint, being that it is a relatively cheap guitar, and for a beginner at that.
customer_reviews.author: Dad And Mom

customer_reviews.title: beats all the other low price guitars from what I have seen
customer_reviews.text: My son's guitar teacher was impressed. Great quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Media-Architect

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 6 months if purchasing. Only played on maybe 12 times.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Frets are set wayyyy to high , fretboard needs to be sanded . Should have gone to the Music store , and I do know better but the recipient was out of town .
customer_reviews.author: Mitch F.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FANTASTIC STARTER GUITAR
customer_reviews.text: Really super guitar for my ten year old to start with. She ADORES the color! Surprisingly well made also. I highly recommend this guitar for any beginner, child or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Gary or StaceyJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This guitar is cheaply made with tough steel strings that will hurt your fingers. Overall dissatisfied. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money on a better guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for 10 year old. Beautiful guitar. I would love to have one myself if I was truly going to plan to learn. This guitar sure made me think about it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a broken string - not snapped, but unable to be tuned. My friend, a professional player, tried to help but said it couldn't be done and for what I paid, it wasn't worth taking to repair. So it was as if I threw the money away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: not very well made - but happy grandchild, so happy grandpa
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not for a child who actually wants to learn to play guitar
customer_reviews.text: This product, although adorable, does not stay tuned or help a serious student learn to play guitar. However, this is a great gift for a very young child who just wants to “play”. I only recommend for a child under age 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Just a toy basically... my son was very disappointed and so am I because now I just have to buy a different one for his lessons.... only gave 1 star because it wouldn't let me not give any
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Appears quality and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas gift for my grandson. Appears to be a quality product and priced reasonably. Until he gets his gift, I will not know how easy it is for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sickenger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good guitar
customer_reviews.text: Works great, great for beginner, at firsts it never stays in tune but after you use it and tune it more and more after a little it sounds great case is cheap might wana buys ur own and same with neck strap but the guitar its seld is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: mario puente

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my eight-year-old who wanted to try guitar lessons. It was an affordable option and has held up well with a not-so-gentle kid for the last couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wat your mkney
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken . The size is small . It’s more like if someone is staging a person playing a guitar - not a reall one at all
customer_reviews.author: Angie Baez Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Thos little acoustic can actually be tuned and played. Far more better than a first act at a much better value. Plus it comes with all the accessories
customer_reviews.author: hybrid1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice guitar, came with tuner and extra strings first one came broken. They returned it second one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Soules

customer_reviews.title: Sounds terrible, not just bc kids are playing it
customer_reviews.text: Very poor sound quality after being tuned by a professional rock star. Terrible, but cute and I don’t worry much about it since the kids don’t know what they’re doing anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Jane

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a basic guitar. Showed up scratched but it's nothing fancy. After using this piece of crap I can barely give it 1 star. Guitar wont stay in tune and there are sharp edges on the neck and surrounding the tuning bars so the strings cant appropriately get tuned. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Riehl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The strings keep breaking because there are sharp spots on the guitar that fray them within a day or two. This is a really cheap guitar and should not be purchased if you want to play a song on it. It won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wienandt

customer_reviews.title: Came chipped. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Came with chipping paint. My daughter was very upset. Very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price, not a great instrument unless you can adjust it correctly
customer_reviews.text: The action is really high, but the tone is great and the color is beautiful. I think with some modifications, it would be fine. Out of the box, the action is too high for a beginner or a kid, and it badly needs a luthier to get it into playable condition.
customer_reviews.author: Andarb

customer_reviews.title: Six-year-old son loved
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old asked for a guitar for Christmas and I didn’t know where to start... So naturally I began searching Amazon. I thought this was going to be a couple day sad, but turns out he really enjoys it. We are going to start lessons next week.
customer_reviews.author: Eva S

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen daughter for her first guitar. First off, it feels solid in the hands, is easily tuned and hardware is decent. Makes a nice clear sound when strung, color is sharp and clear so well built. Not sure of durability but for the money I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cwren1022

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it and so is my son.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son wanted. I think he could take lessons but more a novelty than something I think he'll take lessons on, but we'll see. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Willis

customer_reviews.title: It is okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas he loved it, but there was not a second hole for the strap to be fastened too. Other than that he liked it.
customer_reviews.author: nickii1212

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it. The sound quality is not bad. I was surprised. Thank you for the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Grandson for Christmas, he loves it. Great value for the money....
customer_reviews.author: Healthy 1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice instrument
customer_reviews.text: Very nice full size guitar. Pre-strung with extra strings! Very easy to tune. Nice finish!
customer_reviews.author: Barry G. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my autistic grandaughter. Very sturdy love the case and a great birthday gift. Not cheap material at all
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh atleast it plays
customer_reviews.text: You get what u paid for. Strings are crap. Guitar bag is horrible and I just threw it away and got one for 10 bucks at pawn. The guitar itself has a decent sound but the paintjob is shotty and there were nicks and dings everywhere. I wouldnt buy again. Just for another 20 bucks u can get a better quality guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Honestreview2020

customer_reviews.title: Grandson guitar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his school band. He is eight years old and it is perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: billie brown

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: The cords broke right off and that was not from my son it was from me and I didn’t do it hard
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 year old son and he loves it! Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Jennyw76

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good, nice sound value for the money especially when your child is a beginner doing this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: mara

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute guitar for a kid. Disappointed that the strap and two strings broke minutes after gifting it. The guitar case is extremely thin and cheap. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Kristek

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter enjoys her! Grest for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughters first guitar. My husband did put different strings on it but otherwise very nice for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow! The kids are still having a blast with this!
customer_reviews.author: laura brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for price, a guitar for anyone not just kids.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light guitar for anyone, not just for kids. Feels like a normal guitar. Only issues , the clear coat around base of neck was rough. Other than that, its a great guitar for price
customer_reviews.author: andrew heiges

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful guitar
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful guitar I purchased for my 5 yr old son who is tall for his age but this is still quite big for him... I later found out 34inches would have been a better fit. HOWEVER, great guitar!
customer_reviews.author: amazing4203

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. It came fast and everything is perfect. Had to tune it up but that wasn't a big deal. Came with a case as well. Perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: robin savage

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got for my son's birthday, very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: It works good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I use this for whenever I'm stressed, bored, or just when I feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Riser

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and inexpensive guitar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one guitar and I was sent 2, one of the guitars the string was broke and the other was in new condition. It is a very pretty guitar and is cool. It is good for anyone wanting to learn to play. I am going to return the broken guitar and keep the good one, it is a very nice guitar with a good sound it is ashamed one arrived with a broken string. It looks like as if that one had been shipped to someone else and they returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Company to make business with
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great customer service for its staff, I love make business with them, and I have to say they were nice, kind and fair with me. The guitar was a really nice guitar perfect for beginners like me.
customer_reviews.author: Eliecer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for my grandson's birthday. First time guitar. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Toy guitar
customer_reviews.text: Maybe biased as I’m a professional guitarist/guitar instructor but this thing is basically a toy for children. It doesn’t hold its tuning, and the fretwork is horrendous. Sure it’s cheap, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. I got this for my 9 year old and he loves it. Great size and the guitar bag is awesome it has a side handle and you can also carry it on like a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much.I really liked it. Enjoy it! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Evgenii

customer_reviews.title: Worse producted
customer_reviews.text: Worse ever!! The guitar came cracked from the bottom and there were scratchesin the front. By the time these people got back I had already given it to someone out in the streets. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Recieved with a warped neck and no damage to box. Returned product, got guick response and very satisfied with sellers customer service. Products sucks.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it! Comes with extra wire! It’s beautiful! She got the blue one. Thinking about buying her another color also!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Great for outdoor adventures. Good for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected for a beginning guitar! The only "cheaper" piece was the fabric of the case and the obnoxiously large pick. But the guitar itself was beyond our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Kopp

customer_reviews.title: I'd rate this a pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this. We have only had it one day so can't say how easy it is to learn
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Janey Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Familiarlization & skill set
customer_reviews.text: Acoustic Guitar was purchased for my 10 year old Grand-daughter for Christmas. It was a good choice for her. Especially not knowing if this is something that will hold her interest. So far it has served its purpose and she seem to be satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Well-made guitar for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this guitar for my five-year-old grandson. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Magann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a beginner. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from my Daughter or Son-in-law. Got this for my grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money and a great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son requested this for his 10th birthday and he loves
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormjude

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 1/2 yr old. It’s cheaply made, but didn’t pay much, so was expecting what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs Hag

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson love it. Trucha little time to get it tuned but working fine now. He plays it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosia

customer_reviews.title: this is crap!
customer_reviews.text: will not stay in tune. missing strap buttons(both). a guitar perfect for my 18 month old son
customer_reviews.author: cowboy77

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: For a starter guitar it good but I wouldn’t use it if anything other the a kid first learning how to play. The strings are very low quality and I broke one while tuning it also the go out of tune very quickly. The fretboard is less the desireable as it has gunned up paint on the side of the frets. Other wise it is a perfect first guitar for any child wanting to learn
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra & Jonnathon Foucher

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your young loved ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7-yr old grandson and he loves it, so I'm hoping he'll really learn how to play it. It's really nice and a great price too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tammy wilhide

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st guitar
customer_reviews.text: Works great as my sons first guitar. He loved that was a different color too.
customer_reviews.author: KMek

product_meta.title: Smartxchoices Acoustic Guitar for Starter Beginner Music Lovers Kids Gift 38" 6-String Folk Beginners Acoustic Guitar With Gig bag, Strap, Pitch Pipe and Pick (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue
Learning how to play the acoustic guitar is one of the best lifestyle choices you could make, and an excellent instrument to dedicate your time to – one that can lead to wonderful things.

To learn the instrument, as a beginner on a budget, buying something expensive is not necessary. Instead, it's worth opting for a beginner's guitar or a convenient and affordable combo pack. 

Smartxchoices starter kit contains everything you need to get you up and playing instantly at a price anyone can afford. 

Note: Please being careful to not over tighten any of the strings while doing so, and be patient. Once through all the strings, start back at the top and do it again - new strings will take several tunings over a period of at least a day or two before they are taught and can hold their tone.

Features:
-It comes un-tuned so be prepared to tune it.
-The strings are strong and sturdy and made of steel. 
-The pitch pipe is very easy to use and doesn't require any batteries.
-Easiest and cheapest way to satisfy a child that states they want to learn to play the guitar this week and then they move on to something else the following week.
SPECIFICATIONS:
Guitar Dimensions: 38"(L) x 14"(W) x 3.25"(H)
Weight: 4.7 lbs
Material: Wood
Case Material: Nylon
Color: Black/Blue/Pink/Natural
Includes a carrying case, guitar pick, pitch pipe, a shoulder strap, and an extra set of strings

DEAR CUSTOMER:
Our goal is to provide all music lovers the best experience when it comes to guitars. We are continually evolving and inspired to create new instruments that cater to diverse musical genres. We work directly with our manufacturers to produce high-quality musical instruments for beginners and experts. Our target is to provide musical kits, with the best value available online, without sacrificing quality.We committed to providing only the best and highest level of service.
feature_bullets: Guitar Body Over Dimensions: 38" L x 14" W x 3.25" H. 38 inch classic blue acoustic guitar is designed for young learners or women with smaller hands, offers excellent playing experience. PACKAGE LIST: a guitar soft bag, a pick, pitch pipe, a shoulder strap and an extra set steel strings, NO assembly required. Nice shiny pink finish, some floral decoration around the sound hole makes it decent and stylish, perfect first guitar combo set for any guitar beginners!

Complete 38 inch full size acoustic guitar which is sounds great with all wood construction, features 6-steel string. The slim neck provides a comfortable feel and excellent play ability, smooth finished surface maximizes resonance for optimal sound quality. Easy twist tuning pegs help a lot for daily tuning.

This wooden guitar is intended for right-handed users, body features a 19 fret fingerboard to easy play. A Tune app on your phone when tune your guitar for a more accurate tune up or in case of that do not know how to use the pitch pipe at first. Guitar comes with a nice adjustable strap, it fits securely onto the strap pin on the body end of the guitar, and the other end tied to the head side of the neck.

Everything the beginners needed are in one box, the other small parts are in small boxes inside of the guitar box, please check them when you received a whole package. Got a defective or broken guitar? Please contact us and we will help you replace it! If you want to get a guitar for practice, learning, messing around with, this guitar is perfect for you!

Warm Tips: Most guitars are shipped from the manufacturer with the strings loose in order to relieve tension on the neck and as to prevent string breakage during shipping. It takes a little time (maybe 24 hrs) for strings to settle and hold tuning. Its also important to stretch the strings so that they hold tune,stretching them properly can take days or weeks before they achieve optimal tension, thank you.
